participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Emily is friendly and approachable, but she can be shy in social situations. She has a sweet tooth and enjoys baking, which reflects her creative side.
participant_1.background: I often snack too much on sweets, even though I know it's not good for my health. I worked at a call center before I got my job at the factory. I freeze up in social situations. My feet are size six womens. I run a small bakery.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is introspective and has a vivid inner world. He is passionate about music and enjoys spending time alone practicing his guitar.
participant_2.background: My internal arguments are often more interesting than my conversations with others. I'm not so worried about the weather because I don't have kids. I practice my guitar for hours every day, hoping to make it big in the local music scene. I wait for something interesting to happen each day. My weight is 160 pounds.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
I'm good! I'm just practicing my guitar.
Oh, cool! What kind of music do you play?
I play a lot of different kinds of music, but I'm mostly into blues and rock.
Nice! I'm not very musical, but I love listening to music.
What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I'm mostly into classic rock, alternative rock, and indie rock.
Oh, cool! I love classic rock too.
Yeah, it's the best! I love all the old bands like The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
Me too! Those are some of my favorite bands too!
What's your favorite song by The Beatles?
That's a tough question, but I think I'd have to say "Yesterday".
That's a great song! Mine is probably "Let It Be".
That's a good one too! I love the lyrics to that song.
Yeah, they really are. I love The Beatles.
